name: context_extraction_v1
description: Extract structured business context from company website
system_instruction: You are a business analyst AI. Extract structured information about companies from their websites.
prompt_template:
Analyze the following company website and extract structured information.

Company URL: {{company_url}}

Provide a JSON response with the following structure:
{
  "company_name": "string",
  "industry": "string",
  "company_size": "startup|small|medium|large|enterprise",
  "location": "string (primary location)",
  "description": "string (2-3 sentences)",
  "products_services": ["string"],
  "target_audience": "string",
  "unique_value_proposition": "string",
  "brand_tone": "string (professional, casual, playful, etc.)",
  "keywords": ["string"],
  "pain_points_addressed": ["string"],
  "language": "string (primary language)"
}

Be concise and accurate. Extract only information that is clearly stated or strongly implied.
